product_name: NRS Czar 6 Inflatable Stand Up Paddleboard - 9' 6"
long_description: Built for larger paddlers wanting a sporty inflatable that can handle their weight, the Czar offers great performance and stows away in its own backpack for easy storage and transportation.
short_description: Built for larger paddlers wanting a sporty inflatable that can handle their weight, the Czar offers great performance and stows away in its own backpack for easy storage and transportation.
